Articles.Content:
Landing on land is boring! To fix the revolting, "classic" way of landing, I built an airstrip that's able to support anything you throw at it (warranty void if any object thrown at it)! So let's get to the features!

**Features of your now favorite craft:**

Supports BOTH landers and planes!

Mobile to drive to any desired place

Lights that are WAY too bright for guaranteed night landings

An amazing surprise at 4x warp (download to see)!

Seats for your tortur...I mean kerbals!

Low part count for huge size!

And a lot more for you to discover! (so corny)

(I recommend KJR to make sure folding and other events do not occur)
